rule.condition: not (same(hasAssigned.FunctionalGroup in $L.file, NULL)) and same(hasAssigned.Person in $L.file, NULL)
rule.conditionDesc: ( hasAssigned.FunctionalGroup in CurrentRecord != NULL AND hasAssigned.Person in CurrentRecord = NULL)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assigned Group">hasAssigned.FunctionalGroup</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Assigned Person">hasAssigned.Person</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">NULL</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Send HTML Email: sd.assign.group (when ( Assigned Group in CurrentRecord != NULL AND Assigned Person in CurrentRecord = NULL))
